name: Harald: A Game of Influence
description: Harald is a card game of influence and majority. As the head of a village, each player will try to charm the most influential character of the realm to be noticed by the King and win his favor. But to win you will need to think and wisely use the abilities of each character.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32 bit Processor: 2 ghz processor single core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 510
